text: 23:13 Ua Me Ini 28:1Amramɨn otarimningɨn ziamning kara: Aron ko Moses. Ikiavɨra Itir God Aron ko an ovavir boriba amɨsefe, eghtɨ me zurara gumazamiziba God ganɨdir bizibar ganam. Egh uari akuvamin dughiabar, me Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn pauran mughuriar aghuim zuiba tuva mughuriar aghuim damutɨ an otivam. Me uaghan Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ingangarim damu, egh uaghan an azangsɨghtɨ, a deravɨra gumazamizibar amuam.
